docs.title: Contact
docs.text: alt="SAP Labs LLC" style="height: 20px; vertical-align: middle;">

docs.title: Executive Summary
docs.text:
Strategic and results-driven executive with a proven record in leading innovation, enterprise architecture, and global partnerships. As the Global Co-Lead for SAP AppHaus Network Partners and SAP Enterprise Architect, I drive SAP’s innovation strategy, enabling business transformation with AI, Generative AI, and the SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP).

Notable achievements include supporting Cirque du Soleil’s Accounts Payable transformation using Business AI, and leading API integration efforts for successful production rollout. I’ve fostered high-impact collaborations across North America, EMEA, MEE, APJ, and ANZ, consistently delivering exceptional value.

docs.title: Recognized three times as an SAP Catalyst Employee, I am dedicated to shaping the future of enterprise technology through human-centered design, innovation, and scalable cloud architectures.
Education & Certifications
docs.text:
• Master’s in Information Systems
  • Bachelor’s in Business Management
  • SAP Enterprise Architecture

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC – Global Co-Lead, SAP AppHaus & Enterprise Architect (Nov 2024 – Present)
docs.text:
• Led global strategy for SAP AppHaus Network, enabling innovation through SAP BTP.
  • Established co-innovation spaces in Houston, Minneapolis, and LATAM.
  • Architected Business AI workshops and Generative AI integrations.
  • Supported major customers (e.g., Cirque du Soleil) with API-based system integrations.
  • Prepared SAP Innovation Awards and SAPPHIRE 2025 content.

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC – Regional Lead for NA & LAC (Feb 2023 – Oct 2024)
docs.text:
• Extended partner networks across North and Latin America.
  • Delivered AI transformation initiatives for clients like NBA, Mercado Libre, Petrobras, and Claro.
  • Launched internal and external workshops to enable AI readiness.

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC – Principal Consultant, GCS (Aug 2018 – Jan 2023)
docs.text:
• Championed cloud adoption using GCP and SAP BTP.
  • Built observability platforms integrating Dynatrace, Kyma, and Splunk.
  • Introduced AIOps automation via Terraform and StackStorm.

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC – Senior Consultant, GCS (Mar 2013 – Jul 2018)
docs.text:
• Managed system delivery and ERP/BW/PI/PO migration projects for SAP Palo Alto teams.
  • Enabled PoCs for SAP HANA product launch.
  • Reduced incident response time using PagerDuty and ServiceNow integrations.

docs.title: SAP Mexico – Technical Quality Manager (Mar 2010 – Feb 2013)
docs.text:
• Delivered enterprise transformation for Coca-Cola Femsa and Palacio de Hierro.
  • Specialized in SAP HANA, SAP AGS services, and virtualization across major implementations.

docs.title: SAP Mexico – SAP Contractor / Global DBA (Mar 2007 – Feb 2010)
docs.text:
• Provided hosting and DB support across global teams.
  • Led Unicode migrations and SAP installations.

docs.title: Stellantis – E-Business & DBA (Sep 2002 – Feb 2007)
docs.text:
• Migrated legacy enterprise platforms to scalable cloud-based architecture.
  • Developed web applications for Portugal Telecom.

docs.title: Intelligas – Linux & DB Specialist (Sep 2000 – Aug 2001)
docs.text: • Built early digital tools for transport and logistics with Informix + RF tech.

docs.title: Key Competencies
docs.text:
• Executive Leadership & Global Strategy
  • AI & Generative AI Innovation
  • Cloud Solutions & SAP BTP
  • Partner Ecosystem Development
  • Design Thinking & Human-Centered Innovation
  • Business Process Optimization
